backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining fitness profile and workout plan types, CRUD operations for user profiles, workout/meal plan generation, and access-control-gated query/update methods for a fitness app backend.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the 'Build My Plan' fix feature to its relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens (background, foreground, primary, accent, etc.) used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Powerpal Vite/React app, mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that gates content behind Internet Identity auth, shows loading/login/profile-setup screens as needed, and routes between seven named view states using local state.
frontend/src/components/AdaptiveLevelsVi: Fitness level selector view that lets users pick beginner/intermediate/advanced, saves the updated profile via useSaveCallerUserProfile, and regenerates the workout plan with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/GoalDrivenPlansV: Goal selection view displaying five fitness goal options that saves the updated profile and regenerates both workout and meal plans, with error/success state handling and auto-navigation on completion.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders the Powerpal login landing page with a mascot, feature highlights, and an Internet Identity login button that shows a loading spinner while authenticating.
frontend/src/components/MealPlanView.tsx: Displays a weekly meal plan with per-day cards showing breakfast, lunch, dinner, and dessert meals including macro badges; supports regenerating the plan and navigating to other views.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Multi-step onboarding wizard (personal info → fitness level → goal) that saves the user profile and generates an initial workout plan before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/PowerpalMascot.t: Animated mascot component that displays a context-aware rotating speech bubble alongside the Powerpal mascot image, with configurable size and animation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Full-screen three-step profile setup form (personal details, fitness level, goal) that saves the profile and triggers workout plan generation on completion.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyScheduleVi: Shows the weekly workout schedule as expandable day cards with exercise details, completion toggles, and a refresh button to regenerate the workout plan.
React component that displays a user's workout plan, with buttons to generate/regenerate the plan and navigate to meal plan, adaptive levels, weekly schedule, and goal-driven plan views. Includes a header with back/logout actions and uses the PowerpalMascot component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, workout plan, and meal plan data via the ICP backend actor, including get and generate/save mutations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Barlow fonts, configures Tailwind with a dark athletic color theme using OKLCH variables, and defines custom utility classes and keyframe animations for glow effects, cards, and transitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, mounting it to the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component showing the Powerpal logo, tagline, mascot, and CTA buttons for onboarding or navigating to workout/meal plans, with a feature grid highlighting key app capabilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the Powerpal frontend, defining custom colors (oklch-based), fonts, shadows, border radii, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata for Powerpal (version 3), tracking a known issue and an active fix request to repair the 'Build My Plan' workout plan generation feature in WorkoutPlanView/OnboardingFlow.
